name: Cute 'Em Up :)
description:
Cute 'Em Up :) was made during Pirate Jam 2020, where the theme was "Uncertainty." Your thruster is broken so you spin uncontrollably. Use 1 button (space) to navigate around the world so that you can find parts to repair your ship. Press Space to move. Collect blue dots to shoot for a limited time (you shoot when not moving). Shoot purple planets in order to collect pink dots. 4 pink dots fixes your ship and wins the game. Beware the planets, they look cute but will kill you :)

Made by me (@kirsty_lee0) with cute sound effects and hardware assistance from Jerry (@j3rrytron).
